text:
`datasets.py` has had such a success that it has grown into a 2700+ lines file. However, we had no convention and finding the dataset we want is a bit tedious.

A first step twoard usability has been made in #610. All atlas fetching functions are now starting with `fetch_atlas` and the old ones are still working but raise a warning when they're called.
title: Reorganize datasets.py into submodules
